Class Monster

java.lang.Object
Monster
public class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
Monster class represents the monsters that will be encountered in the adventure. Generally, they will be instantiated inside a CavernNode.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Monster​(int level, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String desc)
    Monster constructor builds a Monster of a certain level, populating fields based on the level.

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster​(int level, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String desc)
      Monster constructor builds a Monster of a certain level, populating fields based on the level. Monster stats such that an adventurer of the same level should be able to beat the monster in an average of 3 hits. Beating three monsters of adventurer level should level up.
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the Monster
      type - The type of creature
      desc - The descibing word for this monster
      Since:
      1.4

  • Method Details

    • getXPValue

      public int getXPValue()
      Returns this monster's XP value for defeat.
      Returns:
      Monster XP worth for defeat.
      Since:
      1.6

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int damage)
      Applies damage to creature by taking away from health
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to deal
      Since:
      1.1

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns the current health of the monster.
      Returns:
      Current monster health.
      Since:
      1.1

    • attack

      public int attack​(int d20Roll)
      Monster attack check. Outputs the attack, to be compared to adventurer AC.
      Parameters:
      d20Roll - The result of a d20 roll
      Returns:
      The monster's attack
      Since:
      1.4

    • giveDamage

      public int giveDamage​(int diceRoll)
      Deals damage from the monster to the player. Returns the number of points of damage dealt, including consideration for a critical strike.
      Parameters:
      diceRoll - The result of a d20 roll for attack.
      Returns:
      The damage dealt by this strike.
      Since:
      1.6

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Override toString method that gives the brief description of the method.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String represention of the Monster
      Since:
      1.5

    • getAC

      public int getAC()
      Returns the monster's AC.
      Returns:
      The monster's AC for comparison against player attack.
      Since:
      1.6
